meanings.definition: Sewn with stitches that overlap and extend beyond the edge of the fabric.
meanings.sent1: The oversewn blanket had a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: The tailor used an oversewn technique for the delicate fabric.
meanings.sent3: The oversewn pillow looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her oversewn dress was a masterpiece of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The oversewn seams added strength to the garment.

meanings.definition: To sew with stitches that overlap and extend beyond the edge of the fabric.
meanings.sent1: She carefully oversewn the hem of the dress.
meanings.sent2: The seamstress oversewn the edges to prevent fraying.
meanings.sent3: He oversewn the patch on his backpack crookedly.
meanings.sent4: The tailor oversewn the buttons securely in place.
meanings.sent5: They oversewn the quilt with colorful threads.
